price: Yeroo “Gooftaan keessan (Muhammad irratti) maal buuse” isaaniin jedhame, “(inni) afoola (ogbarruu) warra duriiti” jedhu.
arabic: وَإِذَا قِيلَ لَهُم مَّاذَآ أَنزَلَ رَبُّكُمۡ قَالُوٓاْ أَسَٰطِيرُ ٱلۡأَوَّلِينَ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: wa-idhā qīla lahum mādhā anzala rabbukum qālū asāṭīru al-awalīna
